title: Vacation Tracker
description:
Vacation Tracker is an all-in-one leave management software designed to help growing teams effortlessly streamline, automate, and manage their PTO. 

Whether you're a small start-up or a sprawling enterprise, our platform is here to make PTO handling a breeze for businesses of all shapes and sizes.

Sign up using your work email or integrate directly with Slack, Microsoft Teams or Google Workspace.
